Time Travel Watch: A wristwatch that allows the user to travel through time. It could have a dial that displays a calendar and allows the user to select a date and time. When the watch is activated, it sends the user to the selected time and place.

Smartwatch with AI Assistant: A wristwatch that has an AI assistant built-in. The assistant could help the user with tasks, answer questions, and provide information. It could also have a voice-activated interface and be able to connect to the user's smartphone for additional functionality.

Wristwatch with Health Monitoring: A wristwatch that has sensors to monitor the user's health. It could track the user's heart rate, blood pressure, and oxygen levels. It could also have a feature that reminds the user to drink water and stand up to stretch.

Wristwatch with Augmented Reality: A wristwatch that has an augmented reality display. The display could show the user information about their surroundings, such as the names of buildings and landmarks. It could also have a feature that allows the user to interact with virtual objects.

Wristwatch with GPS Tracking: A wristwatch that has GPS tracking built-in. It could track the user's location and provide them with directions. It could also have a feature that allows the user to mark their location and return to it later.
